title: The Room of Relics
description: Max Martin and his friends have finally achieved Provectus status at the Monolitho Academy for Stone Holders. Their sixth year promises many changes, along with a competitive GIMM Ball season. As Max takes on his most challenging year yet, the mistakes from his Axial years quickly catch up to him. He is plagued by problems no seventeen year old should have and must prove he’s not finishing his Dark ancestor’s mission. With no other options left, Max dives deep into Monolitho’s past in order to save his future.
author: B.S. Barker
